member.name: P:ANDP.API.Rest.Areas.HelpPage.HelpPageSampleGenerator.SampleObjectFactories
member.summary: Gets factories for the objects that the supported formatters will serialize as samples. Processed in order, stopping when the factory successfully returns a non- object.
member.remarks: Collection includes just initially. Use SampleObjectFactories.Insert(0, func) to provide an override and SampleObjectFactories.Add(func) to provide a fallback.

member.summary: This class will create an object of a given type and populate it with sample data.

member.name: M:ANDP.API.Rest.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.summary: Indicates whether the sample is used for request or response

member.name: T:ANDP.API.Rest.Controllers.AuditController
member.summary: This controller handles all orders.

member.name: M:ANDP.API.Rest.Controllers.AuditController.#ctor(Common.Lib.Interfaces.ILogger)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:ANDP.API.Rest.Controllers.AuditController.Setup
member.summary: The reason this is not in the constructor is solely for the purpose of exception handling. If you leave this in the controller and someone who is not authenticated calls the API you will not get a tenantId not found error. The error will be ugly and be hard to figure out you are not authorized. This way if the all methods have the ClaimsAuthorize attribute on them they will first be authenticated if not get a nice error message of not authorized.

member.name: M:ANDP.API.Rest.Controllers.AuditController.CreateAuditRecords(ANDP.Lib.Domain.Models.AuditRecord)
member.summary: Retrieves the billing audit records.

member.summary: Retrieves the audit records.
